description: The Peek n Peak Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Peek n Peak for the snow report
Alexa, ask Peek n Peak for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Peek n Peak
shortDescription: The Peek n Peak Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Peek n Peak.
